title: Ice Age National Scenic Trail: Ice Age Trail Alliance
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners     Ice Age Trail Alliance              Ice Age Trail Alliance      The Ice Age Trail Alliance is a non-profit, volunteer- and member-based organization established in 1958. Their mission is to protect, promote, build and mantain the many segments of the Ice Age Trail.       Today the Alliance has more than 5,000 members in 40 states with volunteers organized into 21 local chapters along the Ice Age Trail.
